perturbation.original_text: This Agreement is made this 21st day of January 2003 by and between Lucent Technologies Inc., a Delaware corporation having a principal place of business at 600 Mountain Avenue, Murray Hill, New Jersey 07974 ("Lucent") and mPhase Technologies Inc., a New Jersey corporation located at 587 Connecticut Avenue, Norwalk, Connecticut 068545 ("mPhase") (each individually, "a Party" and, collectively, "the Parties"}.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement is made this 21st day of January 2003 by and between Lucent Technologies Inc., a Delaware corporation having a principal place of business at 600 Mountain Avenue, Murray Hill, New Jersey 07974 ("Lucent") and mPhase Technologies Inc., a Delaware corporation located at 587 Connecticut Avenue, Norwalk, Connecticut 068545 ("mPhase") (each individually, "a Party" and, collectively, "the Parties").
perturbation.explanation: The contract states that mPhase Technologies Inc. is a New Jersey corporation, but it has been modified to state that mPhase Technologies Inc. is a Delaware corporation. This contradicts the factual basis and potentially the legal standing of the agreement if mPhase is indeed registered in New Jersey and not Delaware. This could lead to challenges regarding jurisdiction, applicable corporate law, and the validity of actions taken by mPhase under this agreement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: State corporate registration laws (New Jersey Business Corporation Act vs. Delaware General Corporation Law)
